snippet: Mr. Noah had a commanding stage presence as he touched on race, politics and other issues in a show in West Nyack, N.Y.
abstract: Jason Zinoman Critic's Notebook submits that polish, cultural knowledge and finely tuned political argument are qualities that will likely define comedian Trevor Noah's tenure as host of Comedy Central's The Daily Show; says true measure of Noah's success will lie in how he makes show, long identified with former host Jon Stewart, his own.
